original_title: ズームアップ　暴行白書
overview: 1981 Nikkatsu Roman Porno film.  The wife of a prominent businessman works as a late-night radio personality.  One night on her way to the radio station, she is raped by a motorcycle gang without knowing the reason...
tagline: Trampled by a motorcycle gang, betrayed by her husband, and manipulated by the ruse of an old lesbian partner…
title: Zoom Up: Sexual Crime Report
